original_text: At one time we were weak and we could not help ourselves. Then, at the right time, Christ died to save us. He died on behalf of people who have turned away from God.
korean_text: 우리가 아직 연약할 때에 기약대로 그리스도께서 경건하지 않은 자를 위하여 죽으셨도다

sentences.original_text: At one time we were weak
and we could not help ourselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 스스로를 도울 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He died on behalf of people
who have turned away from God.
